TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler(object sender, WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs)
public delegate void WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: 表示處理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會發生此事件時需要列印工作。This event occurs when the needs the of a print job. 在建立 委派時，您要識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
